# HMCharacteristicValueSecuritySystemAlarmType

**Enumeration**

Possible trigger states for an alarm.

## Declaration

```swift
enum HMCharacteristicValueSecuritySystemAlarmType
```

## Alarm Types

- **HMCharacteristicValueSecuritySystemAlarmType.noAlarm**: The alarm isn’t triggered.
- **HMCharacteristicValueSecuritySystemAlarmType.unknown**: An alarm has been triggered with an unknown cause.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: An alarm has been triggered with an unknown cause.
